text.div:
HSPC Data Origination Mode

The description of how the data came into being.

Copyright Statement: TBD

This value set has an inline code system Intermountain Healthcare HDD, which defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
14610118 StatedInformation that is given directly, either verbally or written, that is not the result of a measurement or estimate.

In addition, this value set includes codes from other code systems:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://snomed.info/sct
    CodeDisplay
    414135002Estimated
    258104002Measured

name: HSPC Data Origination Mode
description: The description of how the data came into being.

concept.definition: Information that is given directly, either verbally or written, that is not the result of a measurement or estimate.
